column4: how can i know the version of chatzilla ? chatzilla --version does not work
what's the command to know the version of chatzilla ?
Package `mozilla-chatzilla' is not installed and no info is available.
Package `mozilla-chatzilla' is not installed and no info is available.Use dpkg --info (= dpkg-deb --info) to examine archive files,and dpkg --contents (= dpkg-deb --contents) to list their contents.
do you have the chatzilla program on your system ?
if i click chatzilla from Internet>chatzilla and then   ps aux  isee a process like seamonkey-bin
normally, if you start the program, there should be a menu entry that gives the version of the program
yea it's ChatZilla 0.9.75.1 ,but is there any command to display that ?
there is no general command to display the version of a program
firefox --version  ,isn't a general command to display the version of firefox ?
it may work for firefox, but not for any program
dpkg -l | chatzilla   got this   ii  seamonkey-chatzilla                        1.1.15+nobinonly-0ubuntu2                 Seamonkey Chatzilla IRC client
is chatzilla different or built in for different program ?
i don't know, I don't use it
for mozilla and for seamonkey ,is chatzilla different ?
